structure.unit: ARTICLE C. - COUNCIL MEETINGS AND PROCEDURE

law.text: There shall be four (4) standing committees to be designated as "The Budget and Economic Development Committee," "The Law and Public Safety Committee," "The Public Works Committee," and the "The Comprehensive Planning Committee." (Code 1959 , ยง2-16; Ord. No. 1987-92, ยง1, 12-1-87; Ord. No. 1993-290, ยง1, 12-7-93; Ord. No. 1998-454, ยง2, 11-4-98)
